name: D3D_PXL
description:
D3D_PXL is a foreboding escape and evade game. Avoid the red pixels at all costs. If spotted, run away.
Find the dead pixel. It will be blinking intermittently. When found, position yourself over it and hold Space to repair it. Find the next dead pixel to advance through the levels. At each level, your enemies become faster and more aggressive.
If the red pixels encamp over the dead pixel, you may have no choice but to lead them away before circling back.

Good luck.
